attributes.action: Forbid censorship of political/historical posts on social media
attributes.background: On social media websites such as Facebook, YouTube and Instagram, political expression and content for historical purposes are being censored, which is a suppression of freedom of speech. The right of the people must be protected at all costs to freely express their beliefs and create content.

rejection.details: Terms and conditions of social media sites are the responsibility of those sites, not the UK Government or Parliament.
